tree_elements.text: Home Sweet Home: The North Pole
Job: 246 years of experience in bringing gifts to the homes of well-behaved children and leaving coal for the naughty. Travels on a flying sleigh and enters homes through chimneys.
Job: She may look like a witch with her crooked nose and black cloak, but the sweet lady travels on a broomstick to deliver gifts and bring fortune to all children and their families.
Job: This sage monk’s eyes are at the back of his head and he makes sure that no children’s behavior goes overlooked. Blesses families with presents and good luck.
Job: Half goat-half demon who punishes misbehaving children by stuffing them in his sack and bringing the children to his lair.

file_structural_elements.title: Know Your Holiday Icons!

Business Hours: Christmas (Dec. 25)

Job: 246 years of experience in bringing gifts to the homes of well-behaved children and leaving coal for the naughty. Travels on a flying sleigh and enters homes through chimneys.
